company_description: Does your business have a list of prospects or a means of compiling a list of leads to fill your future sales pipeline? Do happen to have any prospect list, and if you do‚Ä¶are you managing that from a spreadsheet? It's remarkable how often businesses, to this day, are still trying to manage everything entirely from spreadsheets‚Ä¶or they have a conglomeration of far too many disparate systems figuratively duct-taped together will all their necessary marketing data in separate silos. When I see this I know it's more likely than not that lots of potential revenue is likely falling through the cracks‚Ä¶.and we solve that! Led by founder Eric Yaillen, the Megafluence Agency provides small business, coaches, consultants and knowledgepreneurs with the tools they need to work smarter, not harder. We magically eliminate the confusion small businesses encounter when it comes to implementing the right technology and systems to run their business effectively and efficiently. We‚Äôve been building businesses and brands in the sports, entertainment and technology industries for 30+ years. Today, we help small business entrepreneurs and businesses eliminate costly mistakes, save countless hours and expense all by streamlining processes and eliminating unnecessary cobbled together disparate systems. Our platform is has been in use by some of the best marketers in the business since 2017 along with hundreds of thousands small businesses worldwide. Our mission is to empower Small Business Entrepreneurs, Coaches & Consultants‚Ä¶to Achieve all their Goals with the help of a single solution able to support all communication efforts with prospects and customers throughout their customer journey. Better yet, it's all with one low price‚Ä¶.with unlimited contacts. Click on the link below and take advantage of our Free 14-day trial and take your business to the next level. You won‚Äôt find a better, easier to use solution anywhere!

summary: Founding Partner at B&B Executive Leadership (www.bbexecutiveleadership.com) ‚Äî a global partner for leadership solutions, helping organizations and executives unlock their full potential. Please follow our YouTube and LinkedIn channels: YouTube: https://lnkd.in/gqhJZpJ LinkedIn: https://lnkd.in/g4w7qfaQ Email: javier@bedfordbailey.com We operate across Mexico, US, EMEA, Mexico, Brazil, Canada, Spain, Portugal, France, Germany. ‚úì My core values ‚Äî Honesty, Integrity, and Empathy ‚Äî shape the way I lead, build teams, and serve our clients worldwide. ‚úì At B&B Executive Leadership, we operate across four synergistic business lines: 1. Executive Search We connect organizations with exceptional leadership talent. Specialized in C-level, executive, and board placements across the Industrial, Consumer Goods, Pharma, Biotech, Medical Devices, Food & Beverage, Electronics, Energy, and Packaging sectors. We help businesses scale by securing top-performing executives. 2. Executive Coaching Through bespoke leadership coaching, we empower professionals at every stage: from high potentials to senior leaders, new managers, and executives navigating global mobility or transitions. Our coaching unlocks personal and professional growth, accelerating organizational impact. 3. Executive Advisory We advise leaders and ownership teams on complex challenges, including succession planning, organizational design, and leadership transformation. Our strategic insights align leadership capabilities with business goals, ensuring sustainable growth. 4. Executive Assessment Our advanced assessment solutions provide data-driven insights to guide critical leadership decisions. Whether for hiring, development, or succession planning, our assessments help organizations identify, select, and nurture the right leaders. ‚úì I‚Äôve personally advised over 10,000 international executives on career development, transition, and growth strategies ‚Äî helping leaders navigate their careers with clarity and confidence. ‚úì As a C-level Executive Recruiter, I build long-term partnerships with clients and candidates alike, ensuring alignment of values, culture, and strategic objectives. ‚úì Whether you‚Äôre an executive pursuing your next challenge or a company aiming to strengthen your leadership team, I welcome the opportunity to connect. ‚úì Passionate about my family and my three daughters. Avid basketball player, classic movie enthusiast, and lifelong learner, always eager to explore new horizons. Best, Javier

company_description: At B&B Executive Leadership, we redefine how organizations worldwide approach talent, leadership, and career development. We are a global partner for companies looking to acquire, develop, coach, assess, and engage high-impact professionals. With operations in the U.S., Mexico, Canada, Brazil, Spain, Portugal, France, and Germany, our multicultural DNA allows us to connect cultures and human capital seamlessly. We bring a unique, inclusive perspective to every project, helping organizations build diverse and high-performing leadership teams. We operate across four integrated business lines: Executive Search We specialize in C-level and senior executive search across industries, with a strong track record in Industrial, Consumer Goods, Pharma, Biotech, Medical Devices, Food & Beverage, Electronics, Energy, and Packaging. Executive Coaching We design tailored coaching programs for high potentials, senior leaders, new managers, and executives in transition. Our goal is to unlock personal and professional growth, accelerating organizational transformation. Executive Advisory We provide strategic guidance on succession planning, organizational design, leadership transitions, and global mobility. Our advisory services help leadership teams navigate complex challenges and align capabilities with business goals. Executive Assessment Through advanced, data-driven assessment solutions, we support organizations in making confident decisions in hiring, promotion, and leadership development, building future-ready leadership pipelines. At B&B, we are not defined by a single industry ‚Äî we are experts in people and talent. The success of any business depends on identifying, nurturing, and empowering professionals with the technical expertise and interpersonal excellence to thrive. Your company‚Äôs culture is a reflection of its talent density. We help you strengthen it. Connect with us today to explore how we can support your leadership journey.

headline: Decentralized Entrepreneur | Impatient Futurist | 7X Founder | Focused on the Future of Work: Full Time Fractionals, Global Outsourcing, and All-the-Time AI Agents ‚Äî em dash indifferent
summary: Entrepreneur, speaker, ideator & thinker bringing the fractional & decentralized leadership model into the future of work. I‚Äôm a Fractional Futurist, helping fractional executives build million-dollar firms they can scale and eventually exit. Going from 0‚Äì1 is hard. Shifting from freelancer to founder is harder. That‚Äôs where I come in‚Äîwith strategy, structure, and the FROST Framework. I‚Äôm the co-founder of yorCMO, the first decentralized leadership franchise for fractional CMOs. And now, I‚Äôm scaling FractionalPros.com, a platform that connects SMBs with vetted fractional leaders‚Äîand helps those leaders find visibility, leads, and community through niche-driven peer pods. I believe in decentralized teams, strategic clarity, and the idea that every expert deserves a business model that works for them, not just because of them. I‚Äôve had a non-linear career and life. I‚Äôve: - Started a lawn care service in high school and sold the business before college - Studied and worked in chemical engineering - Founded 4 companies: from mortgage financing to media to data haptics tech - Published and written a book on media habits - Taught Entrepreneurship to university students - Created a documentary film on the seasons of entrepreneurship - Launched a community for fractional pros I spent years attempting to reconcile my wildly diverse experiences, let alone trying to explain them to those around me. Eventually, I realized that my decentralized nature was an asset: I could help other entrepreneurs engineer non-traditional, weird, unexpected and creative ideas into their businesses. Often it‚Äôs the simplest ideas that have the power to make a big impact & combust at scale. Board Member at Entrepreneurs‚Äô Organization (EO) Nebraska. I am also the host of a weekly podcast ‚ÄúThe Fractional C-Suite Retreat‚Äù featuring thought leaders on the future of work in the C-Suite. By day, professional tea and coffee drinker; by night, cigar enthusiast and living my best life with my wife and 4 children. Reach out to me for: ‚úîÔ∏è Discussions on how to leverage the power of fractional executive leaders in your business ‚úîÔ∏è Keynotes, talks & panel discussions on the fractional future of work ‚úîÔ∏è Good conversation over a cigar üìß joseph@yorcmo.com

job_description: Do you have marketing PTSD? Looking for someone you can trust to lead your marketing efforts, to build and execute a strategic marketing plan aligned to your sales and growth goals? Is your business looking to pivot, scale, or exit? Do you need marketing expertise on your leadership team? Are you tired of spending money on marketing and not seeing sales results? We promise way better marketing with our fractional marketing approach at yorCMO. We connect you with an unbiased marketing expert - yorCMO - and begin with a marketing audit to establish your baseline. Then we build your marketing strategy during our foundation sessions, and finally we help you and your team execute with our quarterly action sessions and weekly check-ins. We are your outsourced or fractional Chief Marketing Officer - yorCMO.
company_description: Every business wants to grow, but far too many of them waste money on disorganized marketing tactics and strategies that, in the end, don‚Äôt support that goal. At yorCMO, we believe getting clear about your marketing goals and tactics is essential to your business‚Äôs success. Our goal is to help growth-minded CEOs gain someone they can trust to execute their marketing better than they are currently. Since 2016, we‚Äôve built a growing team of fractional CMOs, exclusively limited to those with decades of experience and proven leadership in various industries. As part of the yorCMO proven process, your CMO becomes a fiduciary partner, building your customized strategy and executing it in a way that drives up sales, without wasting any more of your time or money. But our work could never be possible by simply remaining in the ‚Äúoutsider‚Äù role that is so common among marketing consultants, agencies, and vendors. That‚Äôs why when you partner with us, we‚Äôre more than a consultant. We‚Äôre on your team‚Äí but for a fraction of the cost of adding on another full-time employee. Our results-driven fractional CMO model is designed to allow us to integrate with your existing team so that you get the customized solutions, C-Level expertise, and proven process you need. It‚Äôs a model designed around our belief that ‚Äúyour success is our success,‚Äù and we are uncommonly committed to your success. Schedule a free consultation with our team today and stop wasting time and money on ineffective tactics and start growing your business with confidence and competence: info@yorcmo.com | www.yorcmo.com

I serve as a Fractional CMO for service-based businesses doing $1M+ in annual revenue who are ready to scale faster without the massive cost of a full-time CMO. Here‚Äôs how I help: ‚Ä¢ Align your marketing strategy with real business growth goals ‚Ä¢ Build and lead your marketing team (in-house or outsourced) ‚Ä¢ Optimize your marketing systems (CRM, funnels, ads, SEO, content) ‚Ä¢ Drive performance with clear KPIs, analytics, and decision-making ‚Ä¢ Free you up to focus on running and scaling your business If you're ready to: ‚úÖ Get marketing that finally supports your growth goals ‚úÖ Stop wasting money on disconnected efforts ‚úÖ Have a real marketing leadership partner at your side Let's connect. üì© DM me or book a time to chat here: https://in2itivebiz.com/free-consultation/

job_description: We are a boutique digital marketing agency focusing on supporting small businesses leveraging marketing that works. We build websites, from simple websites, to complex quiz funnels, e-commerce, and more to support a range of businesses from beginners up to over 100 Million per year in revenue. We build sales funnels, to help our clients grow their lead generation in cutting edge ways, including quiz funnels. Gone are the days that an automated webinar or a simple free guide are going to get significant traction by themselves. Instead we focus on creating a multi-layered, and nuanced approach to our clients' advertising and marketing that support optimal lead generation. We manage ads on a variety of different platforms, including Google, Meta, and LinkedIN. We do not believe that there is a single one-size fits all solution for all businesses, but rather each business has its own unique culture, and demands for the number of leads they want to generate, each demanding a custom approach.

headline: Talent Architect‚Ñ¢ | Designer of Organizational Intelligence | Human Analytics + Leadership Design for Growth-Stage CEOs... Vistage Speaker & Executive Advisor | Little League Baseball World Series Umpire
summary: Most highly successful executives hit a wall. They‚Äôve climbed the ranks, mastered execution, and built an impressive 'successful' career‚Äîbut something feels off. They‚Äôre operating at full capacity yet feel stuck, disconnected, or unfulfilled. Often their families miss them. They put in long hours doing their best to create the lifestyle that their families enjoy. What's next? The next level of leadership isn‚Äôt about doing more. It‚Äôs about thinking differently. I help elite executives and business owners break past their own limits‚Äînot by optimizing what already exists (transforming), but by redefining what‚Äôs possible (transcending). My work is about shifting leaders from high-achieving professionals to visionary self-leaders who transcend their own success and create an impact that lasts. Who We Work With: üí° High-performing executives & entrepreneurs ready to lead boldly & live beyond üí° CEO groups (Vistage, YPO, EO) looking to develop next-level leadership thinking üí° Business accelerators & incubators preparing founders & scale-up leaders to navigate high-stakes decision-making üí° Corporate leadership teams who need to elevate their top players for sustained impact Keynote Talks & Executive Workshops: üé§ The Optimization Trap üé§ Why do smart people suddenly get stupid around you? üé§ Stop being indispensable and start being invaluable. üé§ Breaking Through the Leadership Ceiling: Why Doing More Isn‚Äôt the Answer My Approach: ‚úÖ Help executives transition from high achievers to high-impact, inspiring visionaries ‚úÖ Show leaders how to eliminate what no longer serves their growing business or future self ‚úÖ Provide decision-making frameworks that drive exponential growth ‚úÖ Equip business leaders with tools to navigate complexity, uncertainty, & rapid change This isn‚Äôt about incremental improvement‚Äîit‚Äôs about transcendence. If you‚Äôre part of a CEO peer group, accelerator, or leadership forum looking for a transformative speaker or workshop facilitator, let‚Äôs connect. üì© DM me or reach out to explore how I can support your leaders & teams.

headline: Designing leadership architecture for flat, AI-accelerated organizations‚Äîwhere trust, conflict, and coordination must be systematized, not managed by role.
summary: AI is flattening organizations faster than most leaders can adapt. Skilled managers are downsized. Layers are shrinking. Work is speeding up. And leadership models built on control and hierarchy are breaking down. I provide architecture that makes teams self-managing for Fractionals, Business Owners, Consultants and Coaches. Leaders and HR partners tell me the same thing: ‚ÄúWe know collaboration matters‚Äîbut we can‚Äôt measure it, sustain it, or scale it.‚Äù That‚Äôs where the TIGERS¬Æ 6 Principles System comes in. It equips leaders and HR partners to turn AI-driven flattening into a human advantage through measurable trust, collaboration, and engagement. For more than 30 years, I‚Äôve helped organizations‚Äîfrom Fortune 500s to nonprofits‚Äîcreate high-trust, self-aligning cultures that thrive in complexity. The TIGERS System builds six measurable principles that drive collaboration: Trust | Interdependence | Genuineness | Empathy | Risk Resolution | Success. These aren‚Äôt soft skills. They‚Äôre behavioral metrics that leaders can observe, measure, and scale. That‚Äôs why we license this framework to coaches, consultants, and HR partners who want to deliver sustainable, people-centered transformation that makes work easier not harder. When trust becomes measurable, transformation becomes unstoppable. If you‚Äôre ready to future-proof your leadership in an AI-flattened world, connect with me here and explore TIGERS6Principles.com Available case studies: Case Study: Costco Corporation. Case Study: Northrop Grumman. Case Study: Sunswept Resorts

Using a validated system based on 6 principles from business, psychology, and education research, TIGERS¬Æ transforms good organizations into excellent ones by building collaborative work cultures and employee-centric leadership. Our comprehensive approach includes tools to identify problem areas, targeted micro-training to resolve them, and clear measurement of results. Whether you're a manager, business owner, or consultant, we provide the training and resources you need to reduce turnover, improve engagement, and deliver measurable ROI. With the TIGERS 6 Principles -- Trust, Interdependence, Genuineness, Empathy, Risk resolution and Success -- you eliminate guesswork and invest in solutions that create lasting impact.

headline: Business Consultant | The New Art of Living
summary: My journey's been quite a ride: from an Army brat to Military Police, then a police officer, paramedic, Navy spouse, and a business owner for 30 years. All those experiences gave me a unique lens for navigating life's big challenges. And my military dad? He taught me that your word is everything, period. That's always been my North Star. Then came the moment that changed everything. After my husband, Jim, passed away, I found myself in a really vulnerable spot, something I never expected despite my business success. That feeling was a huge wake-up call. I just refused to let anyone else go through that, so I dug in and mastered how to build lasting stability and well-being. My friends say I'm stubborn about everything, and hey, they're not wrong! For over 20 years, I've had the incredible privilege of helping hundreds of families and thousands of folks become their most resilient selves. My passion is empowering the people who truly keep our country going‚Äîveterans, folks in rural America, farmers, truckers, and entrepreneurs. I love taking complicated stuff and making it simple, helping people really step into their power. My approach is pretty straightforward: think strategically, make smart choices, and use what you've got effectively. My biggest tip? Consistent, focused effort really does pay off big time in the long run. With six generations of military service in my family, helping those who've served is deeply personal for me. And living out here in rural America, I'm constantly working to help our communities find their footing and build a strong future, generation after generation. You know that saying, "you are who you spend time with"? That totally changed how I connect with people. I love bringing clients, experts, and executives together because I really get what makes them tick‚Äîtheir challenges, their dreams, all of it. When I'm not busy helping people create brighter futures, you'll find me on my farm, training horses and dogs. Oh, and get this: at 60, I'm on zero meds and can deadlift almost 300 pounds! It just goes to show you that the same rules apply whether you're building a strong life or a strong body: ditch what doesn't serve you, stay consistent, and nail the basics. That... is the new art of living.
